name: Bay Leaf Salt
recipeIngredient: 5 bay leaves, preferably fresh, center vein removed with sharp knife
Sea salt or fleur de sel

recipeInstructions.text: If using fresh bay leaves, toast in a hot pan until fragrant, then dry overnight in a 100-degree oven. If using dried bay leaves, toast in hot pan until fragrant, then let cool.
In a mortar or spice grinder, grind bay leaves until fine. Measure powder and combine with double the amount of salt. Store in an airtight container until ready to use.
